I am a UI/UX designer and former think tank researcher. I believe in rigorous research, simplicity, and iteration. My experience in the think tank world designing studies, improving service-delivery design, interviewing amazing human beings, and designing visualizations has taught me one very important lesson: empathetic design can change lives. These days, I design digital products that each aim to solve a problem. It's not much different ... it's just more colorful.

Right now I'm most excited about: the Durham Women in Tech group and the variety of sauces at Heavenly Buffaloes.
Learn more about me.
Want to talk? Email me!
